data:
{"post_stream":{"posts":[{"id":3049094,"name":"Chris Gerth","username":"gerthworm","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/gerthworm/{size}/268658_2.png","created_at":"2022-04-22T18:46:43.064Z","cooked":"

This year, a bunch of robots put colors and patterns on their robots to give the drivers a heads-up indication of some state their robot is in. I think it looks pretty and beautiful, and want to see more of this in the future!

What sorts of things do the colors on your robots mean? What sorts of things did you see on other robots that you liked?

","post_number":1,"post_type":1,"posts_count":10,"updated_at":"2022-04-22T18:46:43.064Z","reply_count":0,"reply_to_post_number":null,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":11,"reads":183,"readers_count":182,"score":106.6,"yours":false,"topic_id":409675,"topic_slug":"functional-led-colors","display_username":"Chris Gerth","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":"","bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[{"id":2,"count":1}],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":24617,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":""},"post_url":"/t/functional-led-colors/409675/1","custom_user_title":null,"reactions":[{"id":"heart","type":"emoji","count":1}],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":1,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null,"can_vote":false},{"id":3049096,"name":"Jack","username":"JackOutTheBox","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/jackoutthebox/{size}/161568_2.png","created_at":"2022-04-22T18:54:37.983Z","cooked":"

We planned to have those on our robot this year but before I could get code for that working, our LED strip broke. From what I’ve seen on robots this year though, I agree that it would be really cool to see more of it in the future!

","post_number":2,"post_type":1,"posts_count":10,"updated_at":"2022-04-22T18:54:37.983Z","reply_count":0,"reply_to_post_number":null,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":1,"reads":175,"readers_count":174,"score":40.0,"yours":false,"topic_id":409675,"topic_slug":"functional-led-colors","display_username":"Jack","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":"","bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":50081,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":"FRC 1787 - Lead Goober"},"post_url":"/t/functional-led-colors/409675/2","custom_user_title":"FRC 1787 - Lead Goober","reactions":[],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":0,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null},{"id":3049114,"name":"Einav Bar-Nir","username":"Enavbn","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/enavbn/{size}/197603_2.png","created_at":"2022-04-22T19:15:59.543Z","cooked":"

We had them signal when we had no cargo (red), one cargo (yellow), two cargo (green) and blue when our arm was up and ready to shoot. Sadly ours also broke after one competition

118 has their LEDs turn white when they’re ready to shoot… makes it perfect for defense to know when to hit them!

I believe 4499 did the same thing at Colorado.

","post_number":5,"post_type":1,"posts_count":10,"updated_at":"2022-04-22T19:26:20.873Z","reply_count":0,"reply_to_post_number":4,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":1,"reads":146,"readers_count":145,"score":34.2,"yours":false,"topic_id":409675,"topic_slug":"functional-led-colors","display_username":"Oliver","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":"","reply_to_user":{"id":49167,"username":"democat","name":"Colin Wong","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/democat/{size}/158350_2.png"},"bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":48874,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":"3729 Alum"},"post_url":"/t/functional-led-colors/409675/5","custom_user_title":"3729 Alum","reactions":[],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":0,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null},{"id":3049155,"name":"retrodaredevil","username":"retrodaredevil","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/retrodaredevil/{size}/111923_2.png","created_at":"2022-04-22T20:41:19.709Z","cooked":"
democat:

makes it perfect for defense to know when to hit them!

This gives me the idea of LEDs in a circle around your robot, then only turn on the LEDs that are facing the driver station (based off the gyro angle). Most LED setups probably wouldn’t be made for this, but I think it’s a cool idea.

","post_number":6,"post_type":1,"posts_count":10,"updated_at":"2022-04-22T20:41:19.709Z","reply_count":0,"reply_to_post_number":4,"quote_count":1,"incoming_link_count":0,"reads":124,"readers_count":123,"score":84.8,"yours":false,"topic_id":409675,"topic_slug":"functional-led-colors","display_username":"retrodaredevil","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":"","bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[{"id":2,"count":4}],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":32957,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":"1444 | Java Programmer "},"post_url":"/t/functional-led-colors/409675/6","custom_user_title":"1444 | Java Programmer ","reactions":[{"id":"heart","type":"emoji","count":4},{"id":"thinking","type":"emoji","count":2}],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":6,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null},{"id":3049170,"name":"","username":"AaronUp","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/aaronup/{size}/151708_2.png","created_at":"2022-04-22T21:28:26.560Z","cooked":"

We used blue for one cargo, red for two. With a two position shooter, we had solid for close shot flashing for far.

Also rainbow in auto.

","post_number":7,"post_type":1,"posts_count":10,"updated_at":"2022-04-22T21:28:26.560Z","reply_count":0,"reply_to_post_number":null,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":1,"reads":104,"readers_count":103,"score":25.8,"yours":false,"topic_id":409675,"topic_slug":"functional-led-colors","display_username":"","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":"","bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":3564,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":"1768 Drive Coach "},"post_url":"/t/functional-led-colors/409675/7","custom_user_title":"1768 Drive Coach ","reactions":[],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":0,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null},{"id":3049176,"name":"Richard Link (5920) Lead Mentor 2","username":"rlink","avatar_template":"/letter_avatar_proxy/v4/letter/r/ec9cab/{size}.png","created_at":"2022-04-22T21:40:20.068Z","cooked":"

We (5920) had a different pattern for each of our proposed autos (we planned for 6 (which never got completed, added two more (Low and High), and used that). We also had a pattern for Auto mode, and it shifted to a rainbow pattern when we went into teleop, and had a shooting pattern when the bot was spinning up for shooting. As a safeguard, we coded in a stealth mode that turned off the shooting animation if we noticed other teams attacking us when it was on (didn’t need to). Mostly the shooting animation was for fun.

","post_number":8,"post_type":1,"posts_count":10,"updated_at":"2022-04-22T21:40:20.068Z","reply_count":0,"reply_to_post_number":null,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":1,"reads":98,"readers_count":97,"score":24.6,"yours":false,"topic_id":409675,"topic_slug":"functional-led-colors","display_username":"Richard Link (5920) Lead Mentor 2","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":"","bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":32126,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"post_url":"/t/functional-led-colors/409675/8","custom_user_title":null,"reactions":[],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":0,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null},{"id":3049183,"name":"Justin","username":"Aleejan","avatar_template":"/letter_avatar_proxy/v4/letter/a/c2a13f/{size}.png","created_at":"2022-04-22T22:01:16.989Z","cooked":"

We learned after finals in our second competition that this was a slight issue with indications lol - so we added the ability to disable indications - or even fake when we were going to shoot by just disabling our shooter indication lights or turn them on randomly. Sadly we never got a chance to use them since we really didn’t get defended at states.
